## ARandom.gaussian() method

Returns approx. normal distribution using CLT.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central\_limit\_theorem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Central_limit_theorem)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gaussian(n?: number, offset?: number, scale?: number): number;
```

|  offset | <code>number</code> |  |
|  scale | <code>number</code> |  |

`number`
